titleStmt.title: The countrey-man's apothecary or, a rule by which countrey-men may safely walke in taking physicke. Not unusefull for cities. A treatise, shewing what herbe, plant, root, seed, or minerall, may be used in physick in the room of that which is wanting. Published for the good of the kingdome.
De succedaneis. English.
titleStmt.author: Rondelet, Guillaume, 1507-1566.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Th. Andrews, in Smithfield, neer St Bartholomews gate,

notesStmt.note: By Guillaume Rondelet, whose name appears on A2r.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
